titles.title: Lahaina National Heritage Area Study Act
Lahaina National Heritage Area Act
Lahaina National Heritage Area Study Act
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating certain land as the Lahaina National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 622.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Lahaina National Heritage Area Act
This bill directs the National Park Service to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating Lahaina, Maui County, Hawaii, as the Lahaina National Heritage Area under the National Heritage Areas Act.
